sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="800">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text">
              Upload PDF Files
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col
                  v-for="(file, index) in pdfFiles"
                  :key="index"
                  cols="12"
                  md="6"
                >
                  <v-card class="mb-3">
                    <v-card-title>{{ getFileLabel(index) }}</v-card-title>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-if="!submittedFiles[index]"
                      v-model="pdfFiles[index]"
                      accept=".pdf"
                      :label="'Select ' + getFileLabel(index)"
                    ></v-file-input>
                    <v-row class="mt-2" v-if="submittedFiles[index]">
                      <v-col cols="4">
                        <v-icon color="blue darken-2" size="48"
                          >mdi-file-pdf-box</v-icon
                        >
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="4">
                        <v-btn icon @click="downloadFile(index)">
                          <v-icon>mdi-download</v-icon>
                        </v-btn>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="4">
                        <v-btn icon @click="deleteFile(index)">
                          <v-icon>mdi-delete</v-icon>
                        </v-btn>
                      </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn color="blue darken-2" @click="submitForm">Submit</v-btn>
              <v-btn color="primary" @click="downloadAllFiles"
                >Download All Files</v-btn
              >
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      userName: localStorage.getItem('userName'),
      pdfFiles: {
        'Solicitud de residencias profesionales': null,
        'Carta de presentación': null,
        'Carta de aceptación': null,
        'Cartilla IMSS': null,
        'Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno': null,
        Anteproyecto: null,
        'Liberación de los 5 créditos': null,
        'Liberación servicio social': null
      },
      submittedFiles: {},
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' },
        { title: 'Archivos', icon: 'mdi-file-document-outline' }
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id')
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    // Fetch submitted files from backend when component is mounted
    this.fetchSubmittedFiles()
  },
  computed: {
    isFormValid () {
      for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
        if (!this.pdfFiles[key]) {
          return false
        }
      }
      return true
    },
    getFileLabel () {
      return (index) => Object.keys(this.pdfFiles)[index]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    // Method to fetch submitted files from backend
    async fetchSubmittedFiles () {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/archivos')
        if (response.status === 200) {
          // Update pdfFiles object with fetched files
          response.data.forEach((file) => {
            // Check if the file exists in pdfFiles object
            const fileName = file.filename
            if (fileName in this.pdfFiles) {
              // Set the file to the corresponding key in pdfFiles object
              this.pdfFiles[fileName] = file
            }
          })
          // Update submittedFiles object with fetched files
          this.submittedFiles = response.data

          // Store submittedFiles in localStorage
          localStorage.setItem(
            'submittedFiles',
            JSON.stringify(this.submittedFiles)
          )
        } else {
          console.error('Failed to fetch files.')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching files:', error)
      }
    },

    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        case 2:
          this.$router.push('/student/archivos')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      localStorage.removeItem('user')
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    async submitForm () {
      try {
        const formData = new FormData()
        for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
          if (this.pdfFiles[key]) {
            formData.append('files', this.pdfFiles[key])
          }
        }
        const response = await axios.post(
          'http://localhost:3000/upload-archivo',
          formData,
          {
            headers: {
              'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
            }
          }
        )
        if (response.status === 201) {
          window.alert('File uploaded successfully!')
          console.log('File uploaded successfully!')
          // Move uploaded files to submittedFiles
          for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
            if (this.pdfFiles[key]) {
              this.submittedFiles[key] = this.pdfFiles[key]
            }
          }
          // Reset the form after successful upload
          this.pdfFiles = Object.fromEntries(
            Object.keys(this.pdfFiles).map((key) => [key, null])
          )
        } else {
          console.error('Failed to upload file.')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error uploading files:', error)
      }
    },
    downloadAllFiles () {
      // Download all files logic
    },
    downloadFile (index) {
      const file = this.submittedFiles[index]
      if (file) {
        const url = URL.createObjectURL(file)
        const a = document.createElement('a')
        a.href = url
        a.download = file.name
        a.click()
        URL.revokeObjectURL(url)
      }
    },
    deleteFile (index) {
      this.$delete(this.submittedFiles, index)
      this.$delete(this.pdfFiles, index)
      this.pdfFiles = { ...this.pdfFiles } // Trigger reactivity
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
